thread.title: BRIEF-Hudson Resources Announces Private Placement For Total Proceeds Of $13.5 Mln

title: BRIEF-Hudson Resources Announces Private Placement For Total Proceeds Of $13.5 Mln
text:
April 30, 2018 / 2:40 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-Hudson Resources Announces Private Placement For Total Proceeds Of $13.5 Mln Reuters Staff
April 30 (Reuters) - Hudson Resources Inc: * HUDSON ANNOUNCES PRIVATE PLACEMENT
* HUDSON RESOURCES INC - WILL BE SEEKING APPROVAL FROM TSX VENTURE EXCHANGE TO COMPLETE A NON-BROKERED PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF 30 MILLION UNITS
* HUDSON RESOURCES INC - THE 30 MILLION UNITS WILL BE PRICED AT $0.45 PER UNIT FOR TOTAL PROCEEDS TO COMPANY OF $13.5 MILLION
* HUDSON RESOURCES - PROCEEDS OF PRIVATE PLACEMENT WILL BE USED FOR COâ€™S WHITE MOUNTAIN ANORTHOSITE PROJECT IN GREENLAND, AMONG OTHERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
